import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import './sidebar.css' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import {MdDashboard,MdSubject,MdPeople} from "react-icons/md"; function Sidebar() { const [userID, setUserID] = useState(''); const [ucategory, setUCategory] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { setUserID(localStorage.getItem("_id")); setUCategory(localStorage.getItem('ucategory')); }, []) return (
